verses.verse: His foundation <WH3248> is in the holy <WH6944> mountains <WH2042>.
The Lord <WH3068> loves <WH157> the gates <WH8179> of Zion <WH6726> more than all the dwellings <WH4908> of Jacob <WH3290>.
Glorious things <WH3513> are spoken <WH1696> of you <WH5892>, O city of God <WH430>. Selah <WH5542>.

I will make mention <WH2142> of Rahab <WH7294> and Babylon <WH894> to them that know <WH3045> me <WH6429>: behold Philistia, and Tyre <WH6865>, with Ethiopia <WH3568>; this man was born there <WH3205>.
And of Zion <WH6726> it shall be said <WH559>, This and that man <WH376> was born <WH3205> in her <WH5945>: and the highest himself shall establish her <WH3559>.
The Lord <WH3068> shall count <WH5608>, when he writes up <WH3789> the people <WH5971>, that this man was born <WH3205> there <WH5542>. Selah.
As well the singers <WH7891> as the players <WH2490> on instruments shall be there <WH4599>: all my springs are in you.
